hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to the #Water Medallion#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #the Bolero of Fire#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #4# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Zora Mask# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Fire Temple#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Giant's Knife# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #the Spirit Temple# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Bunny Hood# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #the Prelude of Light#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Spirit Temple Boss Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of #time#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Why are you asking me? I don't have any answers! I'm just as confused as you are!

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #5# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that if you don't use your slingshot at all when you play the slingshot minigame, the owner gets upset with you.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a #single Upgrade Deku Scrub#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Sun's Song#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to the #Fire Medallion#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #an Ocarina# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Right

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #2# major items.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to the #Zora Sapphire#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Deku Stick# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #time#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Left

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple Boss Key# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
